summary:
I lead the Space and Commercial Network activities of Viasat Netherlands. I have a technical background in telecommunication engineering, a specialization in project management (PMP certification) with 13 years of work experience in the aerospace sector. I am a continuous learner and I am currently enhancing my business management skills through an MBA in technology management.

I had been working for 4 years at ESA/Estec in the Project Management Support Office for the Navigation Directorate (H2020, Navisp and Galileo Batch #3) and previously for 7 years in Rome for the company IDS as responsible of international projects in the Air Navigation field. 

My work experience also includes the management of SW development projects and system engineering activities in aerospace R&D projects.

I obtained Master’s degree in Telecommunication Engineering in 2008 on time and with honors at the university Federico II of Naples with specialization in electromagnetic fields analysis and remote sensing.  

I am a tenacious person, responsible and precise about work commitment, proactive while dealing with problems. My points of strength are excellent communications skills and capacity to create a collaborative and enthusiastic work environment. I care about diversity and inclusion topics and I am actively participating to the diversity and inclusion council of Viasat.


Specialties: Business plan, P&L plan, Project management, Satellite communication systems, Satellite Navigation systems,  ATM, ATC and Air Space management, SW life cycle, telecommunication systems analysis and design, electromagnetic field analysis, antennas design, remote sensing systems and application, signal processing.
